content.html: When I share how horrible it is to be left for dead as a medically vulnerable person in the prime of my life people feel sorry for me & say it's unfair When I point out that not masking in public is what's leaving me for dead - I'm hysterical, crying victim & asking for the moon
content.value:
When I share how horrible it is to be left for dead as a medically vulnerable person in the prime of my life people feel sorry for me & say it's unfair

When I point out that not masking in public is what's leaving me for dead - I'm hysterical, crying victim & asking for the moon
